mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into d_stockreal_info(id,otc_account,otc_code,branch_no,otcexch_type,fund_account,client_id,money_type,otc_type,current_amount,uncome_buy_amount,uncome_sell_amount,frozen_amount,unfrozen_amount,correct_amount,enable_amount,real_buy_amount,real_buy_balance,real_sell_amount,real_sell_balance,entrust_sell_amount,sum_buy_amount,sum_buy_balance,sum_sell_amount,sum_sell_balance,cost_price,check_str,position_str) values(#{id},#{otcAccount},#{otcCode},#{branchNo},#{otcexchType},#{fundAccount},#{clientId},#{moneyType},#{otcType},#{currentAmount},#{uncomeBuyAmount},#{uncomeSellAmount},#{frozenAmount},#{unfrozenAmount},#{correctAmount},#{enableAmount},#{realBuyAmount},#{realBuyBalance},#{realSellAmount},#{realSellBalance},#{entrustSellAmount},#{sumBuyAmount},#{sumBuyBalance},#{sumSellAmount},#{sumSellBalance},#{costPrice},#{checkStr},#{positionStr})
mapper.update:
update d_stockreal_info
id=#{id},
otc_account=#{otc_account},
otc_code=#{otc_code},
branch_no=#{branch_no},
otcexch_type=#{otcexch_type},
fund_account=#{fund_account},
client_id=#{client_id},
money_type=#{money_type},
otc_type=#{otc_type},
current_amount=#{current_amount},
uncome_buy_amount=#{uncome_buy_amount},
uncome_sell_amount=#{uncome_sell_amount},
frozen_amount=#{frozen_amount},
unfrozen_amount=#{unfrozen_amount},
correct_amount=#{correct_amount},
enable_amount=#{enable_amount},
real_buy_amount=#{real_buy_amount},
real_buy_balance=#{real_buy_balance},
real_sell_amount=#{real_sell_amount},
real_sell_balance=#{real_sell_balance},
entrust_sell_amount=#{entrust_sell_amount},
sum_buy_amount=#{sum_buy_amount},
sum_buy_balance=#{sum_buy_balance},
sum_sell_amount=#{sum_sell_amount},
sum_sell_balance=#{sum_sell_balance},
cost_price=#{cost_price},
check_str=#{check_str},
position_str=#{position_str},
where id=#{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from d_stockreal_info where id in
#{item.id}
